instructions: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add cabbage, caraway seeds and salt. Cook, covered, stirring occasionally, until tender, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from the heat. Add apple, shallot, vinegar, mustard and pepper and stir until combined. Serve sprinkled with toasted walnuts.
ingredients: 1 crisp, sweet apple, such as Braeburn or Gala, cut into matchsticks
title: Warm Red Cabbage Salad
